transArray.content: The room is not big but very clean. The location is convenient and easy to find. The bed is very comfortable to sleep on. Oranges are provided at the front desk, which you can eat for free. The attitude of the staff is okay, quite satisfactory!

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the room attendants and room hygiene. We are very happy to bring you a good stay experience. The hotel strictly abides by the Huazhu Group's room cleaning procedures. We will continue to work hard to provide every guest with a comfortable and secure stay. All hotel staff look forward to your next visit and wish you a happy life. General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
